attributes.action: GIVE US BACK OUR CHRISTMAS!! ITS NOT FAIR OTHERS IN THE UK GET TO CELEBRATE IT!!
attributes.additional_details: We stayed in lockdown for a whole month in November for what? We all thought it was to spend special moments with loved ones. Some of your family might have their last Christmas ever and we cant even spend time with them? PLEASE TAKE THIS PETITION INTO CONSIDERATION.
attributes.background: we want to have our 5 day Christmas break that we were promised by Borris! This is really "inhumane to cancel Christmas" last minute and shouldn't have cancelled Christmas to people in London and others in tier 4 as a surprise. If we cant have the 5 day break let us at least have 1 day on Christmas.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Reinstate the 5-day relaxation of COVID restrictions over Christmas: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/564204

Allow families to have Christmas day together in all tiers: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/564312
